parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the explode step, false to not

parameters.name: RigidSubassembly
parameters.description: True to explode entire sub assembly, false to explode just the selected component

parameters.name: ExplodeRelated
parameters.description: True to explode related components together, false to not

returns: Pointer to a newly created explode step
remarks:
Before calling this method, you must select by mark both an edge direction to explode along and a component to move. For example:
boolstatus = Model.Extension.SelectByID2('', 'EDGE', -0.011, 0.06, 0.084, True, 1, Nothing)
boolstatus = Model.Extension.SelectByID2('squarebolt1-1@Assem1', 'COMPONENT', 0, 0, 0, True, 2, Nothing, swSelectOptionDefault)
